Notebook module¶

Module wich contain the custom FlatNotebook class

Classes:

NotebookPanel(parent, topwindow)

Customized Notebook class

Styled_Editor(parent, topwindow, text, on_card)

Customizable Editor page
class Notebook.NotebookPanel(parent, topwindow)¶

Bases: wx.lib.agw.flatnotebook.FlatNotebook

Customized Notebook class

Parameters

fnb.FlatNotebook (wx.lib.agw.flatnotebook.FlatNotebook) – A class of notebook to derivate

Methods:

custom_notebook(theme)

Custom the Notebook according to the theme passed on args

new_page(filename, path, text, on_card)

Add the new tab and his infos on the notebook

on_paint(event)

Paint a gradient color on the Notebook background

set_focus_editor(evt)

Set the focus on the current editor tab
custom_notebook(theme)¶

Custom the Notebook according to the theme passed on args

Parameters

theme (list) – The theme to apply

new_page(filename, path, text, on_card)¶

Add the new tab and his infos on the notebook

Parameters

  • filename (str) – name of the file opened (or str empty)

  • path (str) – path of the file opened (or str empty)

  • text (str) – text to display on the tab (or str empty)

  • on_card (boolean) – flag to know if the file opened comes from the device connected

on_paint(event)¶

Paint a gradient color on the Notebook background

Parameters

event (wx.Event) – Event to repaint the notebook background

set_focus_editor(evt)¶

Set the focus on the current editor tab
